ROOT.GetStationList: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.ID,A.NAME AS STNAME,E.NAME,C.transformation_capacity AS CAPACITY,D.ID,D.NAME,B.ID,B.NAME_ABBREVIATION,A.OPERATE_DATE,A.LONGITUDE,A.LATITUDE,A.EXPIRY_DATE,A.OPERATE_STATE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_B AS A LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B AS B ON A.DCC_ID=B.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_SUBSTATION_S AS C ON A.ID=C.ID AND C.VOLTAGE_TYPE=9999 AND C.STATE_CODE=1003 LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B AS D ON A.PG_ID=D.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE AS E ON A.TOP_AC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=E.CODE WHERE A.ID IN ({0}) UNION ALL SELECT A.ID,A.NAME,E.NAME,C.transformation_capacity,D.ID,D.NAME,B.ID,B.NAME_ABBREVIATION,A.OPERATE_DATE,A.LONGITUDE,A.LATITUDE,A.EXPIRY_DATE,A.OPERATE_STATE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_B AS A LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B AS B ON A.DCC_ID=B.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_CONVERSUBSTATION_S AS C ON A.ID=C.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B AS D ON A.PG_ID=D.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE AS E ON A.DC_VOLTAGE_TYPE=E.CODE WHERE A.ID IN ({0}) ) ST ORDER BY CAPACITY DESC
ROOT.GetPlantList: SELECT A.ID,A.NAME,E.NAME,C.CAPACITY,D.ID,D.NAME,F.ID,F.NAME_ABBREVIATION,B.ID,B.NAME_ABBREVIATION,A.OPERATE_DATE,A.LONGITUDE,A.LATITUDE,A.EXPIRY_DATE,A.OPERATE_STATE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_B AS A LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B AS B ON A.DCC_ID=B.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PLANT_S AS C ON A.ID=C.ID AND C.VOLTAGE_TYPE=9999 AND C.STATE_CODE=1003 LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B AS D ON A.CONNECTIVE_PG_ID=D.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_COMPANY_B AS F ON A.COMPANY_ID=F.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE AS E ON A.MAX_VOLTAGE_TYPE=E.CODE WHERE A.ID IN ({0}) ORDER BY C.CAPACITY DESC
ROOT.GetLineList: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.ID,A.NAME,E.NAME AS VOLNAME,A.LENGTH,C.IMAXLONG_20,D.ID AS GRIDID,D.NAME AS GRIDNAME,B.ID AS DCCID,B.NAME_ABBREVIATION AS DCCNAME,A.OPERATE_DATE,A.EXPIRY_DATE,A.RUNNING_STATE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_B AS A LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B AS B ON A.DISPATCH_ORG_ID=B.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_ACLINE_P AS C ON A.ID=C.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B AS D ON A.GRID_ID=D.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE AS E ON A.VOLTAGE_TYPE=E.CODE WHERE A.ID IN ({0}) UNION ALL SELECT A.ID,A.NAME,E.NAME AS VOLNAME,A.LENGTH,C.IH,D.ID AS GRIDID,D.NAME AS GRIDNAME,B.ID AS DCCID,B.NAME_ABBREVIATION AS DCCNAME,A.OPERATE_DATE,A.EXPIRY_DATE,A.RUNNING_STATE FROM same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_B AS A LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_ORG_DCC_B AS B ON A.DISPATCH_ORG_ID=B.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DEV_DCLINE_P AS C ON A.ID=C.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_CON_PWRGRID_B AS D ON A.GRID_ID=D.ID LEFT JOIN same:SearchCommonSql:SchemaName SG_DIC_VOLTAGETYPE AS E ON A.VOLTAGE_TYPE=E.CODE WHERE A.ID IN ({0}) ) A ORDER BY A.LENGTH DESC
